name: originator
description: node module originator with test & ci pipeline

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel --optional runtime -d build src
scripts.cover: npm run compile && babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/blue-tape ./lib/*.js --report text-summary
scripts.report: npm run compile && babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/blue-tape ./lib/*.js --report html && open ./coverage/index.html
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile && babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/blue-tape ./lib/*.js --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.deploy: git pull --rebase origin master && git push origin master
